name: Catching Stars (Alix, Chris Logsdon)
description:
Made by Chris Logsdon and Alix Lytton in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020!

🎶 For the best listening experience, we recommend wearing headphones.

Catch the stars while avoiding the skulls to make ethereal melodies, but be careful! The mischievous Commander Cat is in charge of how the stars fall and can trip you up at any moment! Once your beautiful song fills up your "PAW"er gauge to the max, you win!

  • Hold A & D or Left & Right arrows to move to either side of the track
  • Let go of the keys to center your cursor

The buttons on Commander Cat's control panel change how the stars fall: a green "fast" button, a red "pause" button, a yellow "slow" button, and a blue "swap" button. He picks these at random, and sometimes he pulls a special lever for a BIG surprise!

We're new gamedevs who love making silly games to make people smile! If you run into anything that prevents you from playing, please let us know & we'll fix it for you!

🎨 All art & animation by Alix Lytton.

🔊 All SFX & music by Chris Logsdon, except for "Squeaky Toy #1" by Breviceps & "lever-pull" by Timbre on freesound.org.
